He has over 19 years of experience in the real estate industry and was previously associated with Wipro Limited as a Senior Marketing Executive. Sumanth Krishna Raghunathan Director √ó Sumanth Krishna Raghunathan Director He has been associated with Casagrand since June 1,2015. He holds a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Engineering from Anna University and a Post Graduate Diploma in Management from the Management Development Institute, Gurgaon. He was previously associated with CRISIL Limited as Head ‚Äì DEP IRV COM, Kumaran Systems Private Limited as Senior Executive ‚Äì Marketing and HCL Technologies Limited as a Senior Project Manager. Mr Sathish CG Deputy Managing Director, Casagrand Premier Builder Limited √ó Mr Sathish CG Deputy Managing Director, Casagrand Premier Builder Limited Mr Sathish CG is a significant pillar of Casagrand‚Äôs phenomenal growth story and a dynamic leader whose vision, execution excellence, and strategic foresight have helped transform the company into one of India‚Äôs most formidable real estate brands. With 20+ years of expertise in real estate , Mr. Sathish brings a rare blend of deep industry knowledge and proven business-building expertise. Joining Casagrand in 2012, Sathish quickly emerged as a driving force behind the company‚Äôs sales engine. As Controlling Director of Sales, he crafted and executed strategies that generated 40x revenue in order to achieve an extraordinary ‚Çπ7601 Cr in just 13 years. Under his leadership, sales teams have been transformed into agile, result-oriented units backed by robust systems and processes, ensuring efficiency and long-term scalability. In 2018, Sathish took on the additional responsibility of leading the Bengaluru Zone, a market that he transformed beyond expectations. Through precise positioning, strategic partnerships, and operational discipline, he drove a 60x growth in just six years, turning Bengaluru into one of Casagrand‚Äôs most successful zones. Expanding his portfolio further, Sathish launched and has been leading Casagrand‚Äôs resale and rental business (SARA) since 2022. In his current role as Deputy Managing Director, Sathish is working alongside Founder & Managing Director Mr .Arun Mn, sharing responsibility for strategic initiatives, operational control, and tactical decision-making across both residential and non-residential ventures. Raju Venkatraman Independent Director √ó Raju Venkatraman Independent Director He has been associated with our Company since July,2024. He has completed his Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Technology from the Indian Institute of Technology, Madras. He was previously associated with Medall Healthcare Private Limited as the promoter and Managing Director and Firstsource Solutions Limited as the Joint Managing Director and Chief Operating Officer.He was also previously a member of the Board of Directors of American International School ‚Äì Chennai and has also received the Udyog Rattan Award from the Institute of Economic Studies. K V Ganesh Independent Director √ó K V Ganesh Independent Director He has been associated with Casagrand since August,2024. He holds a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Commerce (Honours) from the University of Delhi and has also completed the Senior Management Program from the Indian Institute of Management,Calcutta.He is an associate of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India and an Associate of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India.He was previously associated with Logix Microsystems Limited as chief financial officer,Subex Limited as Chief Financial Officer, Global Head ‚Äì Legal and Company Secretary and TVS Srichakra Limited as the Chief Financial Officer.He was recognised in the 9th edition of the CFO Vision & Innovation Summit & Awards 2023 in appreciation for knowledge sharing.He was presented with a recognition of excellence at the 8th Annual CFO 100 for exceptional calibre and contribution to the world of finance and has also been named as one of the ‚ÄúMost Influential CFOs of India‚Äù by the Chartered Institute of Management Accountants. Rohini Manian Independent Director √ó Rohini Manian Independent Director She has been associated with Casagrand since August,2024. She holds a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Science (Liberal Studies) from Northeastern University, Boston,Massachusetts,USA.She has been a director of Global Adjustments Services Private Limited since 2016 and Go Fashion (India) Limited since 2021. Key Management Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures, Casagrand An instrumental leader behind Casagrand‚Äôs growth story, Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy has been an integral part of Casagrand leadership since 2012. As one of the most versatile and trusted leaders within the organization, he has played a defining role in Casagrand‚Äôs evolution, taking on critical responsibilities across departments and verticals with unmatched dedication and precision. Mr. Reddy began his journey in Casagrand as the Head of Finance and steadily grew into a leadership powerhouse, taking on multifaceted roles such as Controlling Director of CRM , Controlling Director of Engineering , Zonal Director of Chennai (the company‚Äôs primary operational zone), and Director of Casa Grande PropCare . In his current role as Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures , Mr. Reddy works closely with the CEOs and Managing Directors of each vertical in Casagrand and co-leads all Casagrand‚Äôs non-residential businesses to steer performance, drive growth, and explore new opportunities. His portfolio covers Casagrand‚Äôs ventures in Commercial, Spaceintell, School, Hospitality, Propcare, PGT Ventures, Contracts, and other emerging businesses. Notably, under his supervision, Casa Grande Propcare has grown multifold, evolving into a robust foundation for becoming one of India‚Äôs most respected facilities management players. Over the last 13 years, Mr. Reddy has helped shape Casagrand‚Äôs culture of performance, trust, and continuous innovation and continues to be a driving force in propelling the organization into its next phase of growth. √ó Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures, Casagrand An instrumental leader behind Casagrand‚Äôs growth story, Mr. Siva Sankar Reddy has been an integral part of Casagrand leadership since 2012. As one of the most versatile and trusted leaders within the organization, he has played a defining role in Casagrand‚Äôs evolution, taking on critical responsibilities across departments and verticals with unmatched dedication and precision. Mr. Reddy began his journey in Casagrand as the Head of Finance and steadily grew into a leadership powerhouse, taking on multifaceted roles such as Controlling Director of CRM , Controlling Director of Engineering , Zonal Director of Chennai (the company‚Äôs primary operational zone), and Director of Casa Grande PropCare . In his current role as Deputy Managing Director, Group Ventures , Mr. Reddy works closely with the CEOs and Managing Directors of each vertical in Casagrand and co-leads all Casagrand‚Äôs non-residential businesses to steer performance, drive growth, and explore new opportunities. His portfolio covers Casagrand‚Äôs ventures in Commercial, Spaceintell, School, Hospitality, Propcare, PGT Ventures, Contracts, and other emerging businesses. Notably, under his supervision, Casa Grande Propcare has grown multifold, evolving into a robust foundation for becoming one of India‚Äôs most respected facilities management players. Over the last 13 years, Mr. Reddy has helped shape Casagrand‚Äôs culture of performance, trust, and continuous innovation and continues to be a driving force in propelling the organization into its next phase of growth. info@americanahotel.co.uk Having Trouble with Our Contact Form? If you‚Äôre experiencing any issues with our contact form or want to ensure your message reaches us, you can always reach out to us directly through email. Please send your inquiries or messages to info@americanahotel.co.uk using your preferred email client, and we‚Äôll get back to you promptly. Directions Heathrow Airport: From Heathrow Airport you should take the Heathrow Express to Paddington Station. From Paddington Underground Station you should board the Bakerloo line train which will take you to Baker Street Station which is a 3 minute walk from the hotel. Gatwick Airport: From Gatwick Airport you should take the Thameslink Train to London Bridge. From London Bridge Underground Station board the Jubilee line train which will take you to Baker Street Station. Stanstead Airport: From Stanstead Airport you should take the Inter-City Rail Service to Tottenham Hale. From Tottenham Hale you should Board the Victoria line train to Oxford Circus Station. Finally, from Oxford Circus Underground Station you should take the Bakerloo line train to Baker Street Station. In the heart of London!
